description:
Masks don’t work and they ALL know it!

Masks are used to increase the Covid numbers as it will lead to more respiratory issues and illnesses. 

The world is being fooled!

If you really believe covering your face is important to stop this man made virus, then go ahead and buy a face shield which is MUCH more effective then wearing a useless, suffocating mask.

Ask yourself this one question, why would government’s recommend masks instead of face shields knowing full well that they’re much more effective?🧐

I would love to read your comments. I think I know the answer! 

WAKE UP 🐑

🚨Link to article in bio

#sheep #masks #facemask #faceshield #faceshields #cdc #scam #wakeup #wakeupamerica #wakeupworld #covid19 #covid #fauci #arrestbillgates #billgates #coronavirus
